Html:
Hey Guys,

I've been using the toolkit in some of my personal projects for a few months now. Ironically, I think my favorite control is the GradientAnimation. I like to use it as sort of a static, but slick looking, divider bar.

Is there anyway I can help out? My background lies heavily in desktop applications so I really enjoy building custom controls from scratch as well as enhancing the design-time experience of older custom controls. I'd be willing to help out wherever I could be of use, though.

Thanks!
Jeremy

Sure, we will take all the help we can get. :-)

Please contact me at ascend_adm@hotmail.com and I will get you set up.

Thanks,
Scott
